<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="zh-CN">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>刘宇航 - 个人主页</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Noto+Sans+SC:wght@300;400;500;700;900&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        :root {
            --light: #ffffff;
            --light-2: #f8f9fa;
            --light-3: #e9ecef;
            --primary: #3a86ff;
            --primary-light: rgba(58, 134, 255, 0.1);
            --secondary: #8338ec;
            --secondary-light: rgba(131, 56, 236, 0.1);
            --accent: #ff006e;
            --accent-light: rgba(255, 0, 110, 0.1);
            --dark: #212529;
            --gray: #6c757d;
            --transition: all 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.16, 1, 0.3, 1);
            --shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
            --shadow-hover: 0 15px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }

        * {
            box-sizing: border-box;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
        }

        body {
            font-family: 'Noto Sans SC', sans-serif;
            background-color: var(--light-2);
            color: var(--dark);
            line-height: 1.6;
            overflow-x: hidden;
            -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
        }

        ::selection {
            background: var(--primary);
            color: white;
        }

        .container {
            max-width: 1400px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }

        section {
            padding: 80px 0;
            position: relative;
        }

        h1, h2, h3, h4 {
            font-weight: 900;
            line-height: 1.2;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
        }

        h1 {
            font-size: clamp(2.5rem, 5vw, 4rem);
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--primary), var(--secondary));
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            background-clip: text;
            color: transparent;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }

        h2 {
            font-size: clamp(1.8rem, 3vw, 2.5rem);
            margin-bottom: 2.5rem;
            position: relative;
            display: inline-block;
        }

        h2:after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            bottom: -10px;
            width: 100%;
            height: 4px;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--primary), transparent);
            border-radius: 2px;
        }

        h3 {
            font-size: 1.4rem;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
        }

        p {
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            color: var(--gray);
        }

        a {
            color: var(--primary);
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: var(--transition);
        }

        a:hover {
            color: var(--secondary);
        }

        ul {
            list-style: none;
        }

        li {
            margin-bottom: 0.8rem;
            position: relative;
            padding-left: 1.8rem;
        }

        li:before {
            content: '▹';
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            color: var(--primary);
        }

        /* 筛选标签 */
        .filter-tabs {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 10px;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }

        .filter-tab {
            padding: 0.8rem 1.5rem;
            background: var(--light);
            border-radius: 50px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: var(--transition);
            border: 1px solid var(--light-3);
            font-weight: 500;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow);
        }
        

        .filter-tab:hover {
            transform: translateY(-3px);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-hover);
        }

        .filter-tab.active {
            background: var(--primary);
            color: white;
            border-color: var(--primary);
        }

        /* 动态背景元素 */
        .floating-shape {
            position: absolute;
            border-radius: 50%;
            filter: blur(60px);
            opacity: 0.2;
            z-index: -1;
        }

        .shape-1 {
            width: 300px;
            height: 300px;
            background: var(--primary);
            top: 10%;
            left: -100px;
            animation: float 15s ease-in-out infinite;
        }

        .shape-2 {
            width: 400px;
            height: 400px;
            background: var(--secondary);
            bottom: 10%;
            right: -100px;
            animation: float 18s ease-in-out infinite reverse;
        }

        .shape-3 {
            width: 200px;
            height: 200px;
            background: var(--accent);
            top: 50%;
            left: 50%;
            animation: float 12s ease-in-out infinite alternate;
        }

        @keyframes float {
            0%, 100% { transform: translate(0, 0); }
            25% { transform: translate(50px, 50px); }
            50% { transform: translate(100px, 0); }
            75% { transform: translate(50px, -50px); }
        }

        /* 英雄区域 */
        .hero {
            min-height: 100vh;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            background: 
        linear-gradient(rgba(255,255,255,0.9), rgba(255,255,255,0.7)),
        url('images/bg.jpg') center/cover no-repeat;
        background-attachment: fixed; /* 视差滚动效果 */
        }
        .hero:before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, 
                rgba(58, 134, 255, 0.1) 0%, 
                rgba(131, 56, 236, 0.1) 100%);
            z-index: 1;
        }
        

        .hero-content {
            position: relative;
            z-index: 2;
            max-width: 800px;
        }

        .hero-title {
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }

        .hero-subtitle {
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            margin-bottom: 2.5rem;
            color: var(--secondary);
        }

        .badge-container {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 15px;
            margin-bottom: 2.5rem;
        }

        .profile-badge {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 0.8rem;
            background: var(--light);
            padding: 0.8rem 1.5rem;
            border-radius: 50px;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow);
            transition: var(--transition);
            border: 1px solid var(--light-3);
        }

        .profile-badge:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-hover);
        }

        .profile-badge i {
            color: var(--primary);
        }

        /* 时间轴 */
        .timeline {
            position: relative;
            padding-left: 150px;
        }

        .timeline:before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            left: 70px;
            top: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            width: 3px;
            background: linear-gradient(to bottom, var(--primary), var(--secondary));
        }

        .timeline-item {
            position: relative;
            padding: 2.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 3rem;
            background: var(--light);
            border-radius: 20px;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow);
            transition: var(--transition);
            border: 1px solid var(--light-3);
        }

        .timeline-item:hover {
            transform: translateY(-10px);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-hover);
        }

        .timeline-item:before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            left: -50px;
            top: 50px;
            width: 20px;
            height: 20px;
            background: var(--light);
            border-radius: 50%;
            border: 4px solid var(--primary);
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 5px var(--primary-light);
        }

        .timeline-date {
            display: inline-block;
            background: var(--primary-light);
            color: var(--primary);
            padding: 0.5rem 1.2rem;
            border-radius: 50px;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }

        /* 荣誉展示区 */
        .honors-container {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(400px, 1fr));
            gap: 30px;
            margin-top: 40px;
        }

        .honor-card {
            background: var(--light);
            border-radius: 20px;
            overflow: hidden;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow);
            transition: var(--transition);
            border: 1px solid var(--light-3);
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
        }

        .honor-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-10px);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-hover);
        }

        .honor-image-container {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 20px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-light), var(--secondary-light));
            min-height: 300px;
        }

        .honor-image {
            max-width: 100%;
            max-height: 280px;
            object-fit: contain;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
            border-radius: 5px;
        }

        .honor-content {
            padding: 2rem;
            flex: 1;
        }

        .honor-badge {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary), var(--secondary));
            color: white;
            padding: 0.5rem 1.2rem;
            border-radius: 50px;
            font-weight: 700;
            margin-top: 1.5rem;
        }

        /* 技能展示 */
        .skills-container {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(250px, 1fr));
            gap: 30px;
            margin-top: 40px;
        }

        .skill-card {
            background: var(--light);
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 2rem;
            text-align: center;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow);
            transition: var(--transition);
            border: 1px solid var(--light-3);
        }

        .skill-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-10px);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-hover);
        }

        .skill-icon {
            font-size: 2.5rem;
            color: var(--primary);
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }

        /* 页脚样式 */
        footer {
            background: var(--dark);
            color: white;
            padding: 80px 0;
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        /* 社交图标悬停效果 */
        footer a:hover {
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2) !important;
            transform: translateY(-5px);
        }

        /* 响应式设计 */
        @media (max-width: 1200px) {
            .timeline {
                padding-left: 100px;
            }
            
            .timeline:before {
                left: 40px;
            }
            
            .timeline-item:before {
                left: -30px;
            }
        }

        @media (max-width: 992px) {
            .honors-container {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(350px, 1fr));
            }
        }

        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .timeline {
                padding-left: 0;
            }
            
            .timeline:before {
                display: none;
            }
            
            .timeline-item {
                padding: 1.5rem;
            }
            
            .timeline-item:before {
                display: none;
            }
            
            .honors-container, .skills-container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
            
            .hero {
                padding-top: 100px;
                min-height: auto;
            }

            footer {
                padding: 60px 0;
            }
            
            footer h3 {
                font-size: 1.5rem !important;
            }
            
            footer p {
                font-size: 1rem !important;
            }
            
            footer a {
                width: 45px !important;
                height: 45px !important;
                font-size: 1.5rem !important;
            }
        }

        /* 动画效果 */
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(30px); }
            to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
        }

        .animate {
            animation: fadeIn 0.8s ease forwards;
        }

        .delay-1 { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
        .delay-2 { animation-delay: 0.4s; }
        .delay-3 { animation-delay: 0.6s; }

        /* 分类排序标题样式 */
        .filter-header {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }
        
        .filter-label {
            font-weight: 700;
            color: var(--gray);
            margin-right: 10px;
            font-size: 0.95rem;
        }
        
        /* 更明显的分割线 */
        .sort-divider {
            width: 2px;
            height: 24px;
            background: linear-gradient(to bottom, var(--primary), var(--secondary));
            margin: 0 15px;
            border-radius: 2px;
        }
        
        /* 调整按钮组布局 */
        .filter-tabs {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            
        }



        /* 科研经历样式 */
        .research-container {
            display: grid;
            gap: 40px;
            margin-top: 40px;
        }

        .research-card {
            background: var(--light);
            border-radius: 20px;
            overflow: hidden;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow);
            transition: var(--transition);
            border: 1px solid var(--light-3);
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1.5fr;
        }

        .research-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-10px);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-hover);
        }

        .research-image-container {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 20px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-light), var(--secondary-light));
            min-height: 300px;
        }

        .research-image {
            max-width: 100%;
            max-height: 280px;
            object-fit: contain;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
            border-radius: 5px;
        }

        .research-content {
            padding: 2rem;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
        }

        .research-date {
            color: var(--gray);
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            font-size: 0.95rem;
        }

        .research-details {
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            flex-grow: 1;
        }

        .research-details h4 {
            margin: 1.5rem 0 0.8rem;
            color: var(--dark);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 0.5rem;
        }

        .research-details ul {
            list-style: none;
            margin-left: 1.5rem;
        }

        .research-details li {
            margin-bottom: 0.6rem;
            position: relative;
            padding-left: 1.2rem;
        }

        .research-details li:before {
            content: "▹";
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            color: var(--primary);
        }

        .tech-tags {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 0.8rem;
            margin-top: auto;
        }

        .tech-tag {
            background: var(--primary-light);
            color: var(--primary);
            padding: 0.4rem 0.8rem;
            border-radius: 50px;
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        /* 响应式设计 */
        @media (max-width: 992px) {
            .research-card {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
            
            .research-image-container {
                min-height: 200px;
            }
        }

        @media (max-width: 576px) {
            .research-details {
                margin-left: 0;
            }
            
            .research-details ul {
                margin-left: 0;
            }
        }

        /* 教育背景卡片样式 */
        .education-card {
            background: var(--light);
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 2rem;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow);
            transition: var(--transition);
            border: 1px solid var(--light-3);
            
            margin: 0 auto;
        }

        .education-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-3px);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-hover);
        }

        .education-header {
            display: flex;
            gap: 1.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .education-icon {
            width: 60px;
            height: 60px;
            background: var(--primary-light);
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            color: var(--primary);
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }

        .education-subtitle {
            color: var(--secondary);
            font-weight: 500;
            margin: 0.3rem 0;
        }

        .education-meta {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 1.5rem;
            margin-top: 0.8rem;
        }

        .education-meta span {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 0.5rem;
            font-size: 0.95rem;
        }

        .course-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(160px, 1fr));
            gap: 1rem;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }

        .course-item {
            background: var(--light-2);
            padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
            border-radius: 8px;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .course-grade {
            font-weight: 700;
            color: var(--primary);
            min-width: 40px;
            text-align: right;
        }

        /* 响应式调整 */
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .education-header {
                flex-direction: column;
                text-align: center;
            }
            
            .education-icon {
                margin-bottom: 1rem;
            }
            
            .education-meta {
                justify-content: center;
            }
            
            .course-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }

        @media (max-width: 480px) {
            .course-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
        }
        .highlight-list li {
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            line-height: 1.6;
            padding-left: 1.8rem;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        .highlight-list li:before {
            content: "▹";
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            color: var(--primary);
            font-weight: bold;
        }
        
        .highlight-list strong {
            color: var(--primary);
            font-weight: 700;
        }

        /* 证件照样式 */
.profile-photo-container {
    width: 160px;
    height: 160px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    margin: 0 auto 2rem;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 3;
}

.profile-photo {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    border-radius: 50%;
    border: 4px solid white;
    box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
}

.photo-border {
    position: absolute;
    top: -10px;
    left: -10px;
    right: -10px;
    bottom: -10px;
    border: 2px dashed var(--primary);
    border-radius: 50%;
    animation: rotate 15s linear infinite;
    z-index: -1;
}

/* 文字卡片背景 */
.hero-text-card {
    background: rgba(255,255,255,0.85);
    padding: 2rem;
    border-radius: 20px;
    box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
    backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
    max-width: 800px;
    margin: 0 auto;
}

/* 动画效果 */
@keyframes rotate {
    from { transform: rotate(0deg); }
    to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

/* 响应式调整 */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .profile-photo-container {
        width: 120px;
        height: 120px;
    }
    
    .hero-text-card {
        padding: 1.5rem;
    }
}
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- 动态背景元素 -->


    <!-- 英雄区域 -->
    <section class="hero">
        <!-- 背景元素保持不变 -->
        <div class="container">
            <div class="hero-content">
                <!-- 证件照容器 -->
                <div class="profile-photo-container">
                    <img src="images/bgg.jpg" alt="刘宇航" class="profile-photo">
                    <div class="photo-border"></div>
                </div>
                
                <!-- 文字内容添加背景 -->
                <div class="hero-text-card">
                    <h1 class="hero-title">刘宇航</h1>
                    <p class="hero-subtitle">计算机科学与技术 · 专业TOP 0.52%</p>
                    
                    <div class="badge-container">
                        <div class="profile-badge">
                            <i class="fas fa-map-marker-alt"></i>
                            <span>中共党员</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="profile-badge">
                            <i class="fas fa-map-marker-alt"></i>
                            <span>东北大学</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="profile-badge">
                            <i class="fas fa-map-marker-alt"></i>
                            <span>专业排名 1/191</span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <p class="hero-description">
                        在人工智能与计算机科学的海洋中探索，用代码编织梦想，用算法解决现实问题
                    </p>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- 教育背景 -->
    <!-- 教育背景 -->
<section id="education">
    <div class="container">
        <h2><i class="fas fa-graduation-cap"></i> 教育背景</h2>
        
        <div class="education-card animate">
            <div class="education-header">
                <div class="education-icon">
                    <i class="fas fa-university"></i>
                </div>
                <div>
                    <h3>东北大学</h3>
                    <p class="education-subtitle">计算机科学与技术 学士学位 | 2022.09 - 至今</p>
                    <div class="education-meta">
                        <span><i class="fas fa-trophy"></i> 专业排名：1/191（TOP 0.52%）</span>
                        <span><i class="fas fa-star"></i> GPA：4.40/5.00</span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <div class="education-details">
                <h4><i class="fas fa-book-open"></i> 核心课程成绩</h4>
                <div class="course-grid">
                    <div class="course-item">
                        <span class="course-name">高等数学</span>
                        <span class="course-grade">100</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="course-item">
                        <span class="course-name">编译原理</span>
                        <span class="course-grade">100</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="course-item">
                        <span class="course-name">人工智能导论</span>
                        <span class="course-grade">100</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="course-item">
                        <span class="course-name">离散数学</span>
                        <span class="course-grade">100</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="course-item">
                        <span class="course-name">概率论与数理统计</span>
                        <span class="course-grade">100</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="course-item">
                        <span class="course-name">计算机组成原理</span>
                        <span class="course-grade">99</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="course-item">
                        <span class="course-name">C++程序设计</span>

    <script>
        // 筛选和排序功能
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const filterTabs = document.querySelectorAll('.filter-tab');
            const sortButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.sort-btn');
            // 只选择荣誉殿堂部分的卡片
            const honorCards = document.querySelectorAll('#honors-container .honor-card');
            const honorsContainer = document.getElementById('honors-container');
            
            let currentFilter = 'all';
            let currentSort = 'default';
            
            function updateDisplay() {
                // 筛选和排序荣誉卡片
                const cardsArray = Array.from(honorCards);
                
                // 筛选
                const filteredCards = cardsArray.filter(card => {
                    return currentFilter === 'all' || card.dataset.category === currentFilter;
                });
                
                // 排序
                if (currentSort !== 'default') {
                    filteredCards.sort((a, b) => {
                        const dateA = new Date(a.querySelector('.honor-badge span').textContent);
                        const dateB = new Date(b.querySelector('.honor-badge span').textContent);
                        return currentSort === 'desc' ? dateB - dateA : dateA - dateB;
                    });
                }
                
                // 清空容器并重新添加卡片
                honorsContainer.innerHTML = '';
                filteredCards.forEach(card => {
                    honorsContainer.appendChild(card);
                });
            }
            
            filterTabs.forEach(tab => {
                tab.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    if (this.classList.contains('sort-btn')) {
                        // 处理排序按钮
                        sortButtons.forEach(btn => btn.classList.remove('active'));
                        this.classList.add('active');
                        currentSort = this.dataset.sort;
                        updateDisplay();
                    } else if (this.dataset.filter) {
                        // 处理筛选按钮 - 不改变排序按钮状态
                        document.querySelectorAll('.filter-tab[data-filter]').forEach(t => t.classList.remove('active'));
                        this.classList.add('active');
                        currentFilter = this.dataset.filter;
                        updateDisplay();
                    }
                });
            });
            
            // 其他代码保持不变...

        
            
            // 创建粒子背景
            const cosmicBg = document.getElementById('cosmic-bg');
            const particleCount = 100;
            
            for (let i = 0; i < particleCount; i++) {
                const particle = document.createElement('div');
                particle.className = 'particle';
                
                // 随机大小
                const size = Math.random() * 3;
                particle.style.width = `${size}px`;
                particle.style.height = `${size}px`;
                
                // 随机位置
                particle.style.left = `${Math.random() * 100}vw`;
                particle.style.top = `${Math.random() * 100}vh`;
                
                // 随机透明度
                particle.style.opacity = Math.random() * 0.5 + 0.1;
                
                // 随机动画
                const duration = 10 + Math.random() * 20;
                particle.style.animation = `float ${duration}s ease-in-out infinite`;
                
                cosmicBg.appendChild(particle);
            }
            
            // 滚动动画
            const animateElements = document.querySelectorAll('.animate');
            
            const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
                entries.forEach(entry => {
                    if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                        entry.target.style.opacity = 1;
                        entry.target.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
                    }
                });
            }, { threshold: 0.1 });
            
            animateElements.forEach(el => {
                el.style.opacity = 0;
                el.style.transform = 'translateY(30px)';
                el.style.transition = 'opacity 0.8s ease, transform 0.8s ease';
                observer.observe(el);
            });
        });
    </script>
